description: Japanese police placed dummy payment cards in convenience stores to protect the elderly targeted by tech support scams or unpaid money fraud. [...]
title: Japanese police create fake support scam payment cards to warn victims

description: Okta warns of an "unprecedented" spike in credential stuffing attacks targeting its identity and access management solutions, with some customer accounts breached in the attacks. [...]
title: Okta warns of "unprecedented" credential stuffing attacks on customers
